title: AI Workspace
subtitle: Chat with your data and turn raw notes into structured records.
chatEmpty: Start by asking a question about events, tasks, or partnerships.
chatPlaceholder: Ask about events, tasks, or partnerships...
chatTips1: Ask for summaries, owners, and timelines to surface key records.
chatTips2: Use dates, departments, or partner names to narrow results.
chatTipAlert: Responses cite the Elasticsearch records used, so you can jump into details quickly.
chatErrorDesc: Unable to reach the assistant. Please try again.
parseErrorDesc: Unable to parse the pasted text.
intakeTitle: Paste a note to prefill a record
intakePlaceholder: Paste a paragraph about a new event, task, partnership, or lead...
recordCreatedDesc: The new item has been added to the database.
recordCreateErrorDesc: Check required fields and try again.
selectTypeFirst: Select the type first, then AI will extract details
pasteNotesDesc: AI will analyze and suggest the record type
openOriginalHint: Open the form in a larger view
wrongType: Wrong type detected? Select the correct one above.
